channel.title: Usagi Yojimbo RPG
channel.description:
![46d582e55943ecf4048c3e283bad6bcf_original|690x388](upload://nmLLsVcwSdMbREIefDYxJZ8W2aQ.jpeg)
Samurai, Ninja, Gamblers, and other anthropomorphic animals wander 16th Century Japan.
Powered by the Apocalypse and based on the works of Stan Sakai, Usagi Yojimbo's most recent RPG uses support and setbacks as the characters get involved in the mechanization of Lords who don't stop to think how it'll touch the lives of those below them.
You do not need to be at all 4 sessions, but you should be available for at least 2 in a row.
[The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and safety tools Lines and Veils and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2020-05-05 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2020-05-05 time=21:30:00 timezone="America/Chicago"][Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1YdFCokI14EZ0VlvDG) [date=2020-05-12 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2020-05-05 time=21:30:00 timezone="America/Chicago"][Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1YdMjQG5iWMWjL5iKq) [date=2020-05-19 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2020-05-05 time=21:30:00 timezone="America/Chicago"][Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1YdUX59Nt4L3OWraCu) [date=2020-05-26 time=18:00:00 timezone="America/Chicago"] → [date=2020-05-05 time=21:30:00 timezone="America/Chicago"][Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1YdaD0fGY_0h5DcPEv)
